name: Bruxish
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: When it unleashes its psychic power from the protuberance on its head, the grating sound of grinding teeth echoes through the area.

attacks.name: Gnash Teeth
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Synchronoise
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon that shares a type with your opponent’s Active Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
